titleStmt.title: The Statutes of the Colledge of Physicians London worthy to be perused by all men, but more especially physicians, lawyers, apothecaries, surgeons, and all such that either do, or shall study, profess, or practise physick.
titleStmt.author: Royal College of Physicians of London.

titleStmt.title: The Statutes of the Colledge of Physicians London worthy to be perused by all men, but more especially physicians, lawyers, apothecaries, surgeons, and all such that either do, or shall study, profess, or practise physick.
titleStmt.author: Royal College of Physicians of London.

notesStmt.note: Divisional title page on pg. 1(second series): Statuta collegii medicorum Loninensium. The statutes (or by-laws) of the Colledge of Physicians of London; separate pagination and register; in Latin.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
